name: Extend Elixir
summary: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.
description:
Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer. When you consume one of your alchemical items that has the elixir and infused traits and a duration of 1 minute or longer, that elixirâ€™s duration is doubled.Extend Elixir Leads To...

Eternal Elixir, Persistent Mutagen
